MonsterTrait.Name: Action Surge (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
MonsterTrait.Text: Drannin takes an additional action on his turn.

MonsterTrait.Name: Brute
MonsterTrait.Text: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when Drannin hits with it (included in the attack).

MonsterTrait.Name: Dwarven Resilience
MonsterTrait.Text: Drannin has advantage on saving throws against poison.

MonsterTrait.Name: Indomitable (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
MonsterTrait.Text: Drannin can reroll a saving throw that he fails. He must use the new roll.

MonsterTrait.Name: Second Wind (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
MonsterTrait.Text: Drannin can use a bonus action to regain 16 (1d10 + 11) hit points.

MonsterTrait.Name: Special Equipment
MonsterTrait.Text: Drannin wears a control amulet for his shield guardian (see the Monster Manual) and a ring of cold resistance. He also carries a potion of frost giant strength.

MonsterTrait.Name: Multiattack
MonsterTrait.Text: Drannin makes three attacks with his greataxe.

MonsterAction.Name: Greataxe
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (2d12 + 4) slashing damage.
